AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dark Brother
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was once a member of the Dark Brotherhood, and is one of the few surviving members of the Mournhold chapter. [PAWN_nameDef] remember that horrific day well, seeing [PAWN_possessive] fellow Dark Brothers fall one after the other, all because some novice failed to deal with an important target.
